mapper.sql:
WHERE 1 = 1
AND (UTR.USR_TR_TTL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR UTR.USR_TR_PRPS LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USR_TR_RQST (USR_TR_PST_ID , ATHR_ID , GD_ID , USR_TR_TTL , USR_TR_DT , USR_TR_PRPS , USR_TR_MP , USR_TR_GD_HR_PRC , USR_TR_NP , USR_TR_TM , USR_TR_IS_DLT , USR_TR_RSTR_DT , TR_CT_ID , USR_TR_RQ_DTL) VALUES ('UT-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_USR_TR_RQST_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) , '1' , NULL , #{usrTrTtl} , TO_DATE(#{usrTrDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #{usrTrPrps} , #{usrTrMp} , #{usrTrGdHrPrc} , #{usrTrNp} , #{usrTrTm} , 'N' , SYSDATE , #{trCtId} , #{usrTrRqDtl})
mapper.select: SELECT UTR.USR_TR_PST_ID , UTR.ATHR_ID , UTR.GD_ID , UTR.USR_TR_TTL , UTR.USR_TR_DT , UTR.USR_TR_PRPS , UTR.USR_TR_MP , UTR.USR_TR_GD_HR_PRC , UTR.USR_TR_NP , UTR.USR_TR_RSTR_DT , UTR.USR_TR_MDFY_DT , UTR.USR_TR_DLT_DT , UTR.TR_CT_ID , UTR.USR_TR_RQ_DTL , UTR.GD_GNDR , UTR.GD_AGE , UTR.GD_CRR , UTR.GD_WNT_RQ , UTRI.USR_TR_RQ_IMG_ID_URL , UI.USR_LNM , UI.USR_FNM , TS.TR_LCTNS , TS.TR_RQST FROM USR_TR_RQST UTR LEFT JOIN USR_TR_RQST_IMG UTRI ON UTR.USR_TR_PST_ID = UTRI.USR_TR_PST_ID INNER JOIN USR_INF UI ON UTR.ATHR_ID = UI.USR_ID LEFT JOIN TR_SCHDL TS ON UTR.USR_TR_PST_ID = TS.USR_TR_PST_ID WHERE UTR.USR_TR_PST_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT UTR.USR_TR_PST_ID , UTR.ATHR_ID , UTR.GD_ID , UTR.USR_TR_TTL , TO_CHAR(UTR.USR_TR_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USR_TR_DT , UTR.USR_TR_PRPS , UTR.USR_TR_MP , UTR.USR_TR_GD_HR_PRC , UTR.USR_TR_NP , UTR.USR_TR_RSTR_DT , UTR.USR_TR_MDFY_DT , UTR.USR_TR_DLT_DT , UTR.TR_CT_ID , UTR.USR_TR_RQ_DTL , UTRI.USR_TR_RQ_IMG_ID_URL , UTR.GD_GNDR , UTR.GD_AGE , UTR.GD_CRR , UTR.GD_WNT_RQ , CEIL (UTR.USR_TR_DT - SYSDATE) AS DEADLINE FROM USR_TR_RQST UTR LEFT JOIN USR_TR_RQST_IMG UTRI ON UTR.USR_TR_PST_ID = UTRI.USR_TR_PST_ID
ORDER BY UTR.USR_TR_PST_ID DESC
